createsuperuser.des: When you set up a Hyperfiler, you create a super administrator account. The super administrator account lets you configure the Hyperfiler and create more administrator users.
Provide a user name, password, and email account for the super administrator. Passwords should be at least 8 characters and should not contain spaces.

userlogin.des: Enter a valid user name and password to log in. After three failed attempts your account will be temporarily locked.

email.des: The email must be less then 64 characters in length.

username.des: Only letters [a-z, A-Z], numbers, periods and @ are valid characters.The username must be 3 to 32 characters in length.

password.des: The password must contain at least eight characters and include a minimum of one capital letter, one lowercase letter and a number digit.
